town_wealth_growth_factors.negative_tooltip: Bankruptcy: %S ||To replenish your wealth you could disband units or try conquering new regions.||Alternatively you could make valuable trade agreements with economically powerful nations.
Discontent: %S ||Protests and dissatisfaction are harming economic growth.

town_wealth_growth_factors.positive_tooltip: Education: %S ||Increase this by developing your educational buildings such as universities and schools.
Enlightenment: %S ||Researching certain technologies increases economic growth.

town_wealth_growth_factors.negative_tooltip: Global Food Supply: %S ||Upgrade your farms to supply your castle towns with food
town_wealth_growth_factors.positive_tooltip: Global Food Supply: %S ||Ensure you have enough farms to supply your upgraded castles

town_wealth_growth_factors.negative_tooltip: Government: %S ||Your government type can harm economic growth.
town_wealth_growth_factors.positive_tooltip: Government: %S||Your government type encourages economic growth.
Industry: %S ||Increase this by developing your industrial buildings such as workshops and factories.

town_wealth_growth_factors.negative_tooltip: Government: %S ||Your corrupt ministers harm economic growth.
(PLACEHOLDER Underdevelopment: %S ||You are modernising too slow. The populace is craving for it. Try to build modern buildings.
town_wealth_growth_factors.positive_tooltip: (PLACEHOLDER) Stable Development: %S ||Maintain the balance of traditions and modernisation.
Ports: %S ||Increase this by developing your trading ports and fisheries.
Roads: %S ||Increase this by developing your roads, which will improve trading.||Upgrade roads on the infrastructure tab at your region capital.

town_wealth_growth_factors.negative_tooltip: Tax: %S ||Tax rates are slowing economic growth.||Reduce this by lowering tax rates.

town_wealth_growth_factors.positive_tooltip: Enlightenment: %S ||Researching certain technologies increases economic growth.

town_wealth_growth_factors.negative_tooltip: (PLACEHOLDER) Overdevelopment: %S ||You are modernising too fast. The populace is not ready for it. Try to accumulate more modernisation.
town_wealth_growth_factors.positive_tooltip: (PLACEHOLDER) Stable Development: %S ||Maintain the balance of traditions and modernisation.
